attributes.action: To see the standardisation of shoe sizes in the retail industry as part of the Governments Transport Policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lack of standardisation of shoes sizes across the footwear industry, leads to consumer confusion.  This prevents people from walking and forces them to make use of less environmentally sensitive modes of transport.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
